hero.description: A strategic location combining accessibility, appreciation potential, and a quiet residential environment. Living in Crespo means enjoying ocean breezes, walking to the beach, and having everything nearby.

concepto.description: Venezia Tower House in Crespo is more than a place to live. It's a peaceful lifestyle with immediate access to beaches, restaurants, essential services, and everything you need, without losing that sense of privacy and well-being.

tipologias.description: 7 design options tailored to your lifestyle

ubicacion.description: Living well means living close to everything. In Crespo, you'll enjoy the beach, services, and important areas just minutes away.
ubicacion.heroDesc: In the heart of the city, with quick access to everything you need
ubicacion.ubicadoEstrategicamente: Strategically located to offer quick access to the best services and amenities in the city
ubicacion.cercaDeMejor: Close to the best of Cartagena

amenidades.description: Spaces designed for your well-being and comfort
amenidades.heroDesc: Enjoy a full floor of amenities designed for your well-being and entertainment.
amenidades.salonEventosDesc: Versatile spaces for meetings and celebrations
amenidades.parqueaderoDesc: 3 levels of parking for your convenience
amenidades.seguridadDesc: Surveillance system and permanent access control
amenidades.zonasVerdesDesc: Playground and landscaped areas for recreation
amenidades.zonaSocialDesc: Enjoy spectacular city views while relaxing in our common areas designed for your comfort and entertainment.
amenidades.piscinaMainDesc: A perfect space to relax, sunbathe, or gather with loved ones. Ideal for enjoying Cartagena's warm climate.
amenidades.gimnasioMainDesc: Venezia features a room designated for a gym where owners can set up their personal equipment. Once the project is delivered and the administration is established, equipment installation and future improvements will be coordinated.
amenidades.gimnasioItem1: Space adaptable for weights, cardio, and functional activities
amenidades.gimnasioItem2: Spacious and well-ventilated room for your comfort
amenidades.gimnasioItem3: Prepared for equipment according to future administration
amenidades.piscinaAmenidadDesc: Pool with spectacular views and relaxation area

trayectoria.description: Over a decade building dreams and exceeding expectations
trayectoria.heroDesc: Over a decade building dreams and exceeding expectations
trayectoria.historiaDesc1: Since our beginnings in 2016, we have traveled a path marked by vision, commitment, and passion for creating spaces that transcend time. Each project developed has been an opportunity to perfect our processes, elevate our design standards, and respond with excellence.
trayectoria.historiaDesc2: Our dedication to construction quality, architectural aesthetics, and customer satisfaction has allowed us to establish ourselves as a reference in Cartagena, with over 150 residential units delivered.
trayectoria.excelenciaDesc: Unwavering commitment to the highest quality in every detail
trayectoria.confianzaDesc: Transparency and honesty at every stage of the process
trayectoria.innovacionDesc: Cutting-edge designs that anticipate future needs
trayectoria.ctaDesc: Schedule a visit and discover everything Venezia Tower House has for you
trayectoria.proyecto1Desc: Our first project, establishing the quality and design foundations that represent us today.
trayectoria.proyecto2Desc: A firm step in our growth, improving every construction and functional detail.
trayectoria.proyecto3Desc: A successful project combining contemporary design and high functionality.
trayectoria.proyecto4Desc: Our most ambitious project, raising the standards of luxury and comfort.

galeria.description: Discover every space designed with elegance and attention to detail
galeria.heroDesc: Explore every corner of Venezia Tower House

contacto.description: Get a quote for your best housing option with us
contacto.formDescription: Our team of advisors is ready to answer all your questions and guide you through the process of acquiring your apartment at Venezia Tower House.
contacto.mensajeEnviado: Message sent! We'll contact you soon.
contacto.enviarFooter: Send your message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

proyecto.heroDesc: An architectural masterpiece in the heart of the city
proyecto.descP1: Located in Crespo, Cartagena. Venezia Tower House is a contemporary residential project designed for those seeking comfort, strategic location, and a practical, modern lifestyle.
proyecto.descP2: With 16 levels, 3 parking floors, 50 exclusive units, and complete amenities, Venezia integrates current architecture, functionality, and spaces designed for everyday life and new housing and rental dynamics.
proyecto.caracteristicasDesc: Elements that make Venezia Tower House a unique project
proyecto.arquitecturaDesc: Contemporary design with clean lines and high-quality materials, designed to integrate with the urban dynamics of Crespo.
proyecto.espaciosDesc: Functional layouts that maximize natural light, ventilation, and utilization of every square meter.
proyecto.areasVerdesDesc: Playground and green areas for recreation and relaxation for the whole family.
proyecto.seguridadDesc: Comprehensive security system with controlled access and surveillance
proyecto.cronograma: Development timeline and key milestones for the Venezia Tower House project
proyecto.licenciasDesc: Obtaining licenses, final design, and site preparation
proyecto.entregaDesc: Delivery of all units to owners
proyecto.planesDesc: Discover the flexible options we offer to make your apartment purchase at Venezia Tower House a reality.
proyecto.ctaDesc: Contact our advisors for personalized information on prices, availability, and financing plans.

agendarVisita.queIncluyeDesc: Our specialized advisors will guide you on a personalized tour of the facilities, amenities, and model apartments.
agendarVisita.asesoriaDesc: Experts available to answer your questions

tipologiaA.name: Floor Plan A1
tipologiaA.subtitle: For Maximum Comfort
tipologiaA.description: Excellent design and layout offering spacious and comfortable spaces. Ideal for families seeking an elegant home with all modern amenities.
features: Large living room with expansive windows
Master bedroom with private bathroom and private terrace
finishes: Kitchen with upper and lower cabinets
Fully equipped bathrooms with tiles, accessories, and tempered glass in wet areas

tipologiaB.name: Floor Plan B
tipologiaB.subtitle: Comfortable Spaces
tipologiaB.description: Ideal option for those seeking a perfect balance between functionality and style. This floor plan offers well-distributed spaces, a spacious living area, and a balcony with panoramic views, creating a cozy and modern atmosphere.
features: Expanded living room with great lighting
Fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar
Balcony with panoramic views of 13.5 m² (145 sq ft)
finishes: Kitchen with upper and lower cabinets
Fully equipped bathrooms with tiles, accessories, and tempered glass in wet areas

tipologiaC.name: Floor Plan C
tipologiaC.subtitle: Functional Spaces
tipologiaC.description: Compact and efficient design that maximizes every square foot. Perfect for those seeking functionality without sacrificing style.
features: Large living room with expansive windows
finishes: Kitchen with upper and lower cabinets
Fully equipped bathrooms with tiles, accessories, and tempered glass in wet areas

tipologiaD1.name: Floor Plan D1
tipologiaD1.subtitle: Family Luxury
tipologiaD1.description: Excellent layout offering spacious and comfortable spaces. Ideal for families seeking an elegant home with all modern amenities.
features: Large living room with expansive windows
Terrace of 12.6 m² (136 sq ft) with optional jacuzzi
finishes: Kitchen with upper and lower cabinets
Fully equipped bathrooms with tiles, accessories, and tempered glass in wet areas

tipologiaD2.name: Floor Plan D2
tipologiaD2.subtitle: Family Spaces
tipologiaD2.description: Beautiful D2 floor plan featuring a spacious and well-distributed design, ideal for families seeking comfort and style. Enjoy large social areas, comfortable bedrooms, and luxury finishes in every corner. Plus, it includes the option of a jacuzzi on the balcony for unique relaxation moments.
features: Large living room with expansive windows
Balconies of 24.7 m² (266 sq ft) with jacuzzi (Additional purchase)
finishes: Kitchen with upper and lower cabinets
Fully equipped bathrooms with tiles, accessories, and tempered glass in wet areas

tipologiaE.name: Floor Plan E
tipologiaE.subtitle: Studio Apartment
tipologiaE.description: Your best urban retreat. This studio apartment offers a compact yet functional design, ideal for those seeking comfort and style in a smaller space. Perfect for professionals or students who value location and access to all building amenities.
features: Private terrace of 7.2 m² (77 sq ft)
finishes: Kitchen with upper and lower cabinets
Fully equipped bathrooms with tiles, accessories, and tempered glass in wet areas
